short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shoot at the right time to hit the matching color on the spinning ring!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This vibrant and engaging color-matching game challenges your aim and timing. A spinning ring with four colorful segments rotates at the top, while your shooter at the bottom fires random-colored balls to match the segments.

How to Play?

1) Click anywhere on the screen to fire a ball toward the spinning ring.
2) Aim to hit the segment on the ring that matches the ball's color.
3) Score points for each successful hit, with your score displayed at the top of the screen. 
4) Each successful hit reverses the ring's rotation direction.
5) If the ball hits a mismatched segment, the game ends.
6) Your best score will be updated whenever you surpass your previous record.

Strategy:

- Observe the ring's rotation to time your shots perfectly.
- Focus on matching the colors quickly and accurately to maximize your score.

Enjoy the game and challenge yourself to beat your high score. Test your precision and aim to achieve the best results!
